name: burn-text-analyzer
description: A deep learning template for analyzing sentiment in text using the Burn framework
author: Ferrisup Team
next_steps: 📝 Train on the included sample dataset: cd {{project_name}} && cargo run -- train --sample
🧠 Evaluate the model: cargo run -- evaluate --sample
🔍 Analyze a text: cargo run -- analyze --text "This product is amazing!"
📊 Analyze texts from a CSV: cargo run -- analyze-csv --file your_data.csv
📚 Learn more: Read CUSTOMIZATION.md for detailed customization options
